markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Turn Back the Clock](/Feats.aspx?ID=3848) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 186</row>

**Archetype** [Chronoskimmer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=192)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Chronoskimmer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3847)

**Trigger**
You fail a skill check or saving throw.

</column>

---

After failing a test of skill, you hop back in your personal timeline so you can try again. You reroll the triggering check with a +1 circumstance bonus as you apply your experience from your last attempt. You must use the new result, even if it's worse than your first roll.
name: Turn Back the Clock
